::: {#4e6398f1 .cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np
from matplotlib.image import imread
plt.rcParams['figure.figsize']=[16,8]

A=imread("Datasets/puppy.jpg")
X=np.mean(A,-1)
img = plt.imshow(X)
plt.set_cmap('gray')
plt.show()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display}
![](SVD_files/figure-html/cell-2-output-1.png){width=941 height=637}
:::
:::


::: {#00991fb7 .cell execution_count=2}
``` {.python .cell-code}
U,S,VT=np.linalg.svd(X,full_matrices=False)
np.shape(VT)
S=np.diag(S)
for r in [5,20,100,340]:
    Xapprox=U[:,:r] @ S[:r,:r] @ VT[:r,:]
    print(np.shape(Xapprox))
    plt.imshow(Xapprox)
    plt.show()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
(340, 510)
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display}
![](SVD_files/figure-html/cell-3-output-2.png){width=941 height=637}
:::

::: {#037ea46d .cell execution_count=3}
``` {.python .cell-code}
print(np.shape(X))
print(np.shape(U),np.shape(S),np.shape(VT))
print(np.shape(U[:,:r]),np.shape(S[:r,:r]),np.shape(VT[:r,:]))
```
